title: Deleted thread for asking if someone had a condition? It was a serious fucking question.
body:
Are we not allowed to learn more about big members of the community? I genuinely wanted to know if CowSep was mildly autistic. 

http://imgur.com/aqpP189

http://imgur.com/KcfOjpo

AUTISM IS NOT AN INSULT, MODS. IT IS A CONDITION THAT IS NOT ALWAYS OBVIOUS.
